original_text: And the Lord gave Lachish into the hand of Israel, and he captured it on the second day and struck it with the edge of the sword, and every person in it, as he had done to Libnah.
korean_text: 여호와께서 라기스를 이스라엘의 손에 넘겨 주신지라 이튿날에 그 성읍을 점령하고 칼날로 그것과 그 안의 모든 사람을 쳐서 멸하였으니 립나에 행한 것과 같았더라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord gave Lachish into the hand of Israel
and he captured it on the second day
and struck it with the edge of the sword
as he had done to Libnah.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 립나에게 행한 것과 같이 하였더라
